alert.note: Alert for Northern Big Horn; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 9:05PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN BIG HORN...SOUTHWESTERN POWDER RIVER...SOUTHERN ROSEBUD AND EASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES... Patchy dense fog continues in the Sheridan area this evening as well as along I-90 to the Aberdeen Hill vicinity. Visibility is under a half mile locally. The dense fog is also expanding north into southern Rosebud County in Montana. The patchy fog may dissipate overnight in some areas, but remain persistent in others. Motorists should use extra caution in these areas this evening as roads and bridges may be slick from the combination of fog and freezing temperatures in the 20s. Slow down and do not follow to closely. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Ranchester, Clearmont, Leiter, Arvada, Parkman, Tongue River Reservoir, Rosebud Battlefield Park, Wyola, and Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation.

area.areaDesc: Northern Big Horn; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
